name: Digital Selfportrait With Fruit
description: Created for the D2 RenderChallenge#5 and dropped as an NFT with a 5000 pieces editions each sold at 1 tez, the entire revenue will be donated to a charity project committed in helping and supporting the italian artistic and cultural heritage, heavily affected by the pandemic. Follow the project on my twitter account @mnvisual. A small amount for a lot of people can be a big help for several ones. Join the crowd-charity project. Each collector will receive a 5000x4000 px version of the piece.
